name: Inter-Tel Web Conference Recording
summary: Learn about .LREC files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: LREC files can be played back using the Inter-Tel Collaboration Player, which is a standalone application included with the Web Conference software package. Recordings can can be exported to .AVI files using the software.
NOTE: Inter-Tel Web Conference software runs as an application within a Web browser.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
